description.value:
RequirementsÂ You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-archetype-winding-stream-dancer.winding-stream-dancer-feats.Item.vlix0pDKMxTNYOJd]{Winding Stream Dance}.

You aim your scarf to snag a foe's armor, clothing, or flesh to pull them closer. Make a melee @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}. If you hit a target that is a size you are able to affect with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of your current turn, and you can move it 5 feet toward you. When you move the creature, you can move the same distance in the same direction as it, even if you're adjacent to the target. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

This Strike has the following failure effect.

Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of your current turn.
